uploadCSVModal.title: Upload CSV
uploadCSVModal.errorFormat: File should be in csv format

instructions.format: Upload file format should be csv with semicolon (;) as delimiter, make sure no column data contains semicolon (;)
instructions.numberFormat: Use (.) not (,) in latitude and longitude and there should be only one (.) for each longitude/latitude
instructions.precise: Make sure longitude and latitude is precise, slight mistake in longitude and latitude will effect the nearest branch location on the app
instructions.columnSequence: The sequnce of the column should be the same as the example file: branch name, branch type, region, province, city, district, sub-district, postal code, address, latitude, longitude, branch code, area code
instructions.branchCode: Each branch code should contain 4 numbers
